__e: You say that all this is a dream, and that when you're electrocuted you wake up, and when you wake up, we all disappear, right?
I hadn't felt such fear since I was about to be executed and then wasn't.
That no matter who he is, no matter what he did, he shouldn't be killed?
- I think he tried to escape because he knew that whatever he said or did, he'd be killed.
Aren't that many cops who know what it's like having one of their guys executed.
Marry, for my part, I think we hath lost never a man, but one who is executed... for robbing a church.
Then you weren't here when he was executed?
You'll remember that a man went to the gallows because she was too selfish to wait two hours.
But you can't expect them to buy the same story, an uncle who's been guillotined.
Prior to my command, had a woman ever been executed here?
Well, if you'd listened to me, that boy would have been executed.
If he told the king, both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now.
